FuncDef:
The display board-current command displays information about the current of boards.
The display board-power command displays power consumption of a board.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 30 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: Slot       PCB        Volt(V)    Curr(A)    Power(W)     Max(W)
PCB      I2C Addr Chl Status   Required MajorL FatalL MajorH FatalH Elec
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display board-current command can be used to view information about current of boards.
If the parameter slot-id is specified, information about the current of a specified board is displayed. If the parameter slot-id is not specified, information about the current of all boards is displayed.
The display board-power command can be used to view power consumption of a board.
If the parameter slot-id is specified, power consumption information about a specified board is displayed. If the parameter slot-id is not specified, power consumption information about all boards is displayed.
In fan module, the voltage, current and current power consumption is display to NA, since there is no sensor installing in a fan.

Precautions
Support display board-power only on the following boards:
CR53LPUF50A,CR57SFU200B,CR57SFU200C,CR57SRU200A,CR57LPUF120A,CR57LPUF240A,CR5DSFUIE07D,CR57LPUF480B,CR57LPU1TE,CR57SRUA1TA,CR57SFU1TC,CR57SFU1TB,CR57MPUD4,CR57LPU200D,CR57LPUF200C,CR57LPUF50C,CR57LPUF100C,CR57VSUF80,CR57VSUF160,CR57MPUH,CR57SRU100D,CR57SFU100D,CR57SRU200B,CR57SFU21TC,CR57SFU480D,CR57SFU480E,CR57SRU480B,CR57LPUF480D,CR57LPU2TC,CR57SRUA2TA,CR57SRUA1TB,CR57SFU2TD,CR57LPUF240F,CR57LPUF480G,CR57SRU480C,CR57SFU480F,CR57MPUB7,CR57SFU480G,CR57LPUF1TH00,CR57MPUB80,CR57SFU2TE01,CR57SRUA2TB70,CR57SFU2TF00,CR5D0L5XFA7L
Support display board-current only on the following boards:
CR57LPUF120A,CR57LPUF240A,CR57LPUF480B,CR57SRU1TA,CR57LPU1TE,CR57LPUF50C,CR57LPUF100C,CR57VSUF80,CR57VSUF160,CR57MPUD4,CR57LPU200D,CR57LPUF200C,CR57LPUF480D,CR57LPU2TC,CR57SRUA1TB,CR57LPUF240F,CR57LPUF480G,CR57MPUB7,CR57LPUF1TH00
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
